description:
Amy (エイミー?) is the cat featured in the opening. She is a black cat whose story is revealed in the Drama CD: Memories Of You. She is found around Mitakihara City. In the original timeline, she died in a car accident and caused Madoka to wish to bring her back to life. She is good friends with Madoka and Homura after she discovers the cat. According to an interview on NewType Voice July 2011 issue, Amy`s name was inspired by Aoi Yuuki`s cat, who voices Madoka Kaname. It was first used by fans, before the staff officially decided to go with it.
Amy is a short-haired cat whose fur is a purplish-black with white whiskers. The insides of her ears are light pink. Her sclerae are beige with light green irises.
(Source: wiki)
name: Amy
